title: Ohmwrecker or Frozen Heart?
body:
Purely interested in the armour for health trade off. I know the CDR and active/passives are different, but im curious, is the 300HP and health regen worth the 50 armour drop?

{{item:3110}} Frozen Heart is** 100 armour**. 20% cdr, 15% attack speed debuff aura - **costs 2450g**
{{item:3056}} Ohmwrecker is **50 Armour, 300 HP and 100% health regen**.  10% cdr, move 30% faster near turrets, ability to turn off a turret for 3 seconds -  **costs 2600g**

my rough understanding of "effective" health against physical damage would be:
1000HP + 100 armour = 2000HP
1300HP + 50 armour = 1950HP + hp regen.
